# Deflect (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]] \[[[Force Spells|force]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Duskblade Spells|Duskblade 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 immediate action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round or until discharged

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Player's Handbook II (WotC), pg. 109

This spell functions like *[[Deflect, Lesser (Spell)|lesser deflect]]**,* except that you gain a shield bonus to AC equal to 1/2 your caster level (round down) against the next attack made against you before the end of your next turn.
